import React from 'react'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import LandingImage from '../assets/images/landing.jpg'; export default function Home() { return (

Smart Roommate & Apartment Matching

Quickly list your place, explore available rooms, and keep your roommate profile up to date. This MVP focuses on the essential flow so you can get a feel for the experience end-to-end.

  • Secure account creation & login
  • Basic profile editing
  • Property list with create, update, and delete controls
Browse Properties
); }
